page.title: 12Cannon Works
page.content: Cannon is an old established factory that makes gas fires and cookers. The following is the record of an interview with an employee. "How long have you been working at "Cannon?" "I have been working there for eleven years." "Do you like the area of the factory you work in and is your job clean?" "Yes it is quite clean." "What is your job?" "Pickling, which is putting the enamel on the cookers". "Have any new workers been started at the Cannon recently?" "Yes, about six or seven have joined." The employee gave us the impression that the Cannon is a very pleasant place to work. It is also a very important industry,and it appears to be doing well in a time of unemployment.
